com.samsung.multiscreen

Class SearchProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.multiscreen.SearchProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MDNSSearchProvider, MSFDSearchProvider

    public abstract class SearchProvider
extends Object
    SearchProvider is the base search provider class. All search providers must extend from this class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Object obj) 
      List<Service> getServices()
      The list of services found with this provider.

      Start a search using this provider.
      abstract boolean stop()
      Stop a search using this provider.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public abstract void start()
        Start a search using this provider.

      • stop

        public abstract boolean stop()
        Stop a search using this provider.
        Returns:
        true, if the stopping the search using this provider does not immediately return an error. false, otherwise.

      • getServices

        public List<Service> getServices()
        The list of services found with this provider.
        Returns:
        a list of services found using this search provider
